author: djd
msg: DERBY-615 Update testinh README file to match current state with respect to the noSecurityManager property.

author: andreas
msg: Removed DocumentType.getMimeType(), added Document.getMimeType(). This allows different MIME types for documents of the same DocumentType (e.g., image/gif and image/jpeg for image documents).

author: djd
msg: DERBY-615 Modify the tests' policy file to grant permissions to all files and sub-directories under
the extin, extout and extinout directories. Allows the iepnegativetests tests to pass with jars.

author: dicka
msg: Add xsd:all testcases to unit test framework.
